title: Low Performance
body: Ever since the preseason has been out league has been performing poorly for some reason. Could it be an issue on my side or something else that could be causing this?

replies.body: What's going on specifically? The steps I give you will differ depending on if it's lag or fps stuttering or heaven forbid crashes and repatching loops. Hit me back up and let me know so we can get started. Or, feel free to hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if I don't respond fast enough!
